name: com.iron-mountain.package-creator
description: Tools for creating well documented Unity packages.
useCases: Instantly document an assembly in Markdown or HTML format.
directions: Right-click an assembly and select Package Creator > Write Documentation. If a package.json file is in a parent folder of your assembly, the documentation writer will use it to write better content.
author: Chris Monteferrante <ludachrismonte@gmail.com>
